resources.string: This Geofication is still active. Are you sure you want to delete it?
Geofication uses the geofence feature of Google Play Services. This allows the creation and handling of geofences in a very energy efficient and precise way.
The notifications appear delayed or not at all.

If this is the case, please check your system settings. Google Play Services have to be enabled and location enhancement needs to be activated. Also, having a kind of energy saving mode activated will impact the performance of the app, leading to geofences not being triggered in the worst case. Geofences are often not triggered immediately, so they should be made bigger than e.g. a building.
Are there any limitations to the geofences?

The trigger accuracy of the Geofication is influenced by the location accuracy and the size of the geofence. In general, the larger the radius, the better. Geofences are often not triggered immediately, so they should be made bigger than e.g. a building. The minimum geofence radius is %1$s, the maximum is %2$s. Because of restrictions from the Google Play Services, a maximum of 100 geofences is allowed.
Here you can find further information about the app.
No global location found for your given search query.
Hit enter to search for a location name globally
No Geofication or geofence found for the given query.
The notification permission is needed in order to send you a message when you enter or exit your specified geofence.
The general location permission allows the app to track your location. This is needed to check when you enter or exit your geofences.
The background location permission is needed in order for the app to also work when it is closed. If another window opens on click on the button, please select \"Allow all the time\".
Please allow all required permissions to ensure the app works correctly. After that, you will be able to go to the home screen.
Having the Battery Saver Mode activated can lead to Geofications being triggered delayed or not at all. Do you want to disable it?
Do you really want to delete all Geofications, including active ones?
Do you really want to reset all user settings?
Show popup at startup if power saving mode is turned on
Create your first Geofication just on the map tab.
You can create a Geofication by holding down on the map and dragging the circle to the desired size of the geofence.
You can edit a Geofication by pressing the marker in the center of the geofence. You can also open the edit menu in the Geofications list.
Using these options, you can support the developer for example by giving feedback or rating the app. On the GitHub repository, you can open issues and contribute to the project.
You can set a website link here. When the Geofication is triggered, you can open that website by tapping on the notification.
Additional alarm clock-like sound and vibration
Your location is only processed locally on your device and via the integrated Google Play Services. We do not send or store your location online.
Hold down on the map and drag\nto create your first Geofication!
Rate the app in the Google Play Store
Please enter a radius between %1$s and %2$s.
Please enter a valid link format.
Loading the map takes longer than expected. Please check your Internet connection.
